work.position: Aviation Maintenance Egress Leading Petty Officer Leading Petty Officer
work.summary: Performed several roles including Aircraft Operator, Warfare Trainer, QA Representative, and Egress Work Center Shift Supervisor, among others. Demonstrated excellent communication, team building and leadership abilities, and accomplished various feats including over 3,000 mishap free flight hours while maintaining a safe work environment.
